CheckTitle: IP Geolocation is enabled for geographic-based security controls
Description: Verifies that IP Geolocation is enabled to add the CF-IPCountry header to requests, enabling geographic-based access controls, firewall rules, and analytics.
Risk: Without IP Geolocation, geographic-based security controls cannot be implemented, preventing the ability to block traffic from high-risk regions or comply with geographic data residency requirements.

Recommendation.Text: Enable IP Geolocation to support geographic-based security policies. Use this capability to implement geo-blocking rules and gain visibility into traffic origins for threat analysis.

Notes: IP Geolocation is essential for implementing geo-blocking or country-specific security rules.
